name: ViPR Virtual Arrays
description: Gather a list of ViPR Virtual Arrays
transformation:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
  <xsl:template match="/">
    <root>
      <xsl:for-each select="root/varray/varray">
        <xsl:sort select="name"/>
        <results>
          <data><xsl:value-of select="name"/></data>
          <label><xsl:value-of select="name"/></label>
        </results>
      </xsl:for-each>
    </root>
  </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
